paragraph: To stay healthy, it’s very important to eat a variety of food, specially fruit and vegetables. It is very important to have good breakfast in the morning. You shouldn’t have sweets every day.Most of our body is water, so it is necessary to drink plenty of water every day. You shouldn’t drink a lot of fizzy drinks because they aren’t good for your health. You shouldn’t watch TV or play on the computer more than one hour a day.
